# About {-}

This is the syllabus for the module Diagnostic Genome Analysis of the minor Data Sciences for the Life Sciences. 
This document will provide you with enough background material and exercises to complete the projects. 

## Usage {-}

Chapters are divided into subjects. Each subject (chapter) contains a background reading section and exercises. The background reading section contains the necessary information to understand the exercises.
